### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0) 

### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and pipe group (position x=3.5, y=-2.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Lab
Consists of lab (position not specified) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 50} and status EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting connection.
- Check for any obstacles or blockages between the entities.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is empty before attempting to place an entity.
- Check for any existing objects in the way of the target position.

### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure the pipe group is properly connected to the fluid system before attempting to use it.
- Check for any blockages or obstacles in the pipe connections.

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is properly connected to the fluid system before attempting to use it.
- Check for any blockages or obstacles in the pump connections.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine is properly connected to the power network before attempting to use it.
- Check for any blockages or obstacles in the engine connections.
